values:
so. i have finally graduated from uni. it was definitely not an easy path that i have chosen ever since i decided to leave JC in 2007. these 5 years of agony was unforgettable and it will never be forgotten. there were happiness, laughter and tears along the way but i am glad that i have made it through. worth it or not, you decide.

now. i am officially a working adult. there is a different kind of stress, worries and compeition along the way. i must say, i have not yet gotten used to it. it is hard, but i will pull through by hook or by crook.

through these years, i think the biggest achievement i have gotten was friday. out of so many years, i have finally realised and found a friend, a true friend. the 2 years when we were best friends, the 6 years without contacting each other due to misunderstandings, and the 2 years that we buried the hatchet, and finally we managed to find out what really went wrong so many years ago. it took us exactly 10 years to find out who we really are. it was not easy talking things out but hey, we did it and this made our friendship special (: friends come and go, but i believe that she will be there for me this entire lifetime. thank you (:

i think i am breaking down a little earlier than i thought.....

its just not the right time to do so. so much to care about now. i jolly well get it all over and done with.

in the blink of an eye, i have already worked for 2 months, and i am in the last stretch of my last sem. it is just so hectic that i need to take a breather before i go back to hit my book for a test tmr.

work is taxing, sucking every ounce of my energy away. never felt so tired in my life before. the people are nice to me maybe cos i am the youngest there, but of cos there are limitations. its hard to elaborate, but just hoping for the best now.

2 months into my last sem, and i have not settle down. its just hard for me to get into full concentration this sem. tests, projects, lessons, my committment in it decrease as each day passes. my last sem, and i really want to pass it and get it done with. almost 2 years of studying part time, i am finally going to end it in a month. just got pull through no matter what. 

cant wait for june to come. thats when all the agony are over. perseverence is a key factor now. i just need a little motivation for this 2 months to pass by..

another year has passed by in the blink of an eye. time really flies like a plane or whatever.

managed to take a good break this sem and finally got to go back home after 4 years. i must say, everything has changed, changed for the better or worst depends on different views. but i must say it was a trip that i spent meaningfully and it was unforgettable. the trip back has changed many of my thinkings and now i am looking at things in a new perspective.  i always didnt like to go back home in my younger days but i never knew that i missed the place so much once i was back there. the departure was an emotional one. cos after this time, i wont know when will be the next time i will be seeing my grandparents. they are of an old age. it was indeed heartbreaking.

now that i am back in spore. new challenges are ahead waiting for me. looking for job, last sem in uni, getting certs. i just want to use up every ounce of my energy to do everything that i can. realised that time passes too fast to regret anything. so the only way is to spend these moments fulfillingly before i hit the big 3. got to plan my time properly from now on and i need to do sth abt my addiction to the computer.

2 tests and 1 project due this week. its a little hard on the mental and physical state of mind. never knew it would be so difficult.

got to know some unknown truth that was due 6 years ago. it was hard to accept it and i am really shocked to hear that. never knew people were looking and observing my every move and action during that time. just because i was in one of the better class and a top cca doesnt mean that i am high profile, instead tried to make myself as unknown as possible. but i guess, i was at the wrong place at the wrong time. it was still hard for me to accept this fact. argh damnit

woots. nearly a year without posting anything. so much things had happened. life is not easy at all but i think i had somehow understand the way this society works.

stepping into the working world is no joke and indeed it was a big step for me. but i think and realised it is sooooo different from sch. cant talk much, cant show much, cant do much. the only thing i can do is to keep quiet and observe. it was a valuable learning experience for me and i think i will do better for my next job! 

cant believe i have alr worked for one year! one full year of work and of cos studies. cant say it was an easy or taxing year but i think there are sacrifices to be made. one more year and i will be graduating, time flies but i really wanted to make use of this time to enjoy myself to the fullest. wont know how long more i will be staying here but it had played a big part in my life and i will always rmb it. there is a new world for me to challenge it so i shall keep myself fresh

i have learned not to look at things too seriously and i think i am still learning and putting things down well. cos i know some stuff is fated to be like this. but trust still matter to me the most.

had been a long time since i have updated this place.

these 6 months passed like a breeze.
jan, i was still a student then taking my final sem in NYP, being stressed over sch work, icas and projects. and then it comes the final exam which i must say the worst of all the rest. then i have finally officially graduated from NYP after 3 years of studies. i must say i have met an awesome bunch of people. 

march, KL trip was next, spending 4days 3 night at sunway lagoon before everyone goes their separate ways. cant believed that i have worked for 2 months at IRAS too. getting to know the regulations of taxes. 

may, spending a month doing things that i wanted to do.

june, finally another graduation trip to Taiwan with just 4 people. 

it is hard to elborate everything in details because too much as happened. and now its july,  i am starting my uni studies and as well as diligently looking for a perm job. 

indeed its a new beginning, a new thinking, new environment and a new life. i shall live it to the fullest before i regret it.. 

dont think people wil be reading it anymore, it wil be my only place to vent my emotions. it is almost at the second half of the year and many things had changed. changed for the worst for me... not only did i lose my friends but also someone that i have trusted the most in my poly years. i just feel that i was being used instead of being a frd. being used as a listening ear when you drift apart from your frd, being used as person whom you can go out with, whom you can talk to when you are bored, whom you want me to do anything to your own interest. and yes, when you found better frds, patch back again with your frd, of cos, i was abandoned. and under their influence, their words, their actions, i was being treated as rubbish, as a piece of dirt. i have finally seem the reality. i cant blame anyone but myself. let me just treat it as a painful lesson. 

within this 6 months, many things are left unsaid, left unexplained. from being so close to being almost strangers. i really dont know what to say or do. i admit that i am not a proactive person so i think i shld just leave this behind and look foward to a new beginning. 

so from now on, a new beginning starts from here...

so. sch has ended for me. i have unofficially graduated from nyp. (:
 
this whole sem or rather i should say the entire year.. was a life changing one. many things have came and gone by and i have finally seen through many people and leant one thing. that is to live for yourself and not for others. it will only hurt you more if it doesnt reach your expectations. seriously. i got to be more selfish from now on. sadly to say. i lost the trust in someone. i am disappointed. rather depressing too. cos to me, nothing is more important than that. but what can i do. i need time to get over it, i will be fine one day, but not for now...

recently, i have finally pluck up my courage to contact a friend whom i have lost contact with for almost 6 years. we were the best of friends in sec1 and 2. but due to some situations, it caused us to talk lesser and lesser with each other. maybe cos we are now all grown ups. have thought through things properly, and realised that "hey, things are not as bad as what we think last time!" it was a surprising reply from this frd, and it made both of our days. we have agreed to take things easily cos its really kind of wasted for the last 6 years. just imagine that we have known each other for 8 years now and out of which, 6 years are missing. omg.  i cant be more happy to catch up more now.

looking back, i am just about one and half years away from stepping into the corporate world, stepping into the next stage of my life. many do say i have the luxury of many things, but many do not know that i have the burden of the family on my shoulder. i just feel bad for using anymore of my parents money. i dont know why but i really hope i can start earning now and repay them.

there is just too much things to consider. oh wells. but thats life. accept it.
just 3 more weeks and i am out. i cant wait for now. arg. i feel i am framed. like seriously. damn it. forget it. you bastard. careful of what you say. seriously damn it.

the break down yest was just sooo unexpected i guess. i dont know. maybe i have been trying to suppress for a while now. maybe this is how stress is being released. but looking at the situation now. how many more times am i going to break down? haiz..

i realised that i have not done any proper post the entire year. there is just too much things happening, be it memorable or something that hurts and will be engraved in my heart for a period of time.

YEP Project Sousday

we were once strangers, attending pre trip meetings without knowing anyone. and till now, we know each other from head to toe. this is the best trip that i have gone to. I will always rmb the innocent kids, the kind hearted sugar cane lady and the always giving couple, tommy and serena. this trip not only had given me a different perspective in life but also found me some friends with the same hobby. we might not be able to meet up often but i know that they are always there to help each other if any one needs help (:




LTC, cougar!

one of the sch events that i have attended. but this is none like others. had fun tekaning the campers. hahah. but it was a memorable camp as a facil. and the bonds that we have forged.




21st Birthday!

many people asked how i was going to spend it. and my answer was as simple as possible. lol. i didnt understand why 21st bday is such a significant one. it was just a bday and a sign that i am getting old. but. i had fun. loads of fun in fact. (:




the class

outings with the class were great. from dinners, to movies, to prawnings, to buffets, to steamboat to impromptu meetups to overnights!!! it was just awesome! i love the fact that everyone enjoyed each other's company. hmm. maybe not? but i think i had the best class too.




countdown 2011

it was such a different experience as compared to the rest of the year. it was not my first time doing a countdown, but this might be the best one in fact. and. this might be the last and only countdown with poly peeps. but i shall not lose hope? i had fun that night




bud

and through all the thicks and thins, it comes friendship. it had been 9 years and counting. those real bad times we have been through tgt 3 years ago might be engraved in our heart forever, but i know that we have each other.




finally the bad times.

throughout this year, maybe only this year. i have finally realised who is the real who. and who are the butterflies. i shall not elaborate more because some things are left unexplained. some things are just meant to happen. many people want to know why, but so what if i have explained, so what if i said that i have my difficulties? will anyone actually believe me? many just look at the surface. i just need to know it myself, thats all i can do cos i cant please everyone.

it will be another phase of our life since we step out of poly. some may continue with uni while others officially stepping into the working world, but i know that there are some that i will continue to have contact with no matter how different ours lifes wil be from then on.

i have never been giving you my blessing cos i know that you will fail someday. i have never understand this entire thing cos i know i wont. so i just need to accept it since it is my life, my fate and my destiny. i shall now only hope for the best.


so. it is my 2010. i had good and bad times. and i shall not immerse in self pity but to move on. and i shall start the new decade with a fresh me. so. welcome, 2011 (:

so its 2011!!!!!!

2 more months and i officially graduated from poly!

had a great celebration last night, with steamboat breakfast-lunch-dinner. then heading down to marina bay for fireworks, with all the squeezing and pushing, we managed to witness the entire fireworks display! (: and then caught a movie at cathay before heading to starbucks to chill and wait for the first train


(:

sch has been real busy, taking almost all my time away 
projects are bombarding and i have 5 on hand currently 
and i predict a no life jan
last hol before i graudate 
ipp result is out, and i am grateful for it 
life is sweet and sour 
being meeting up with bud and others 
christmas exchange with sousday 
bud leaving in jan for 6 months 
taiwan trip is confirmed but haiz, cross fingers 
ok thats all for now

yknow, this entire thing is going from bad to worst. 

seriously, i dont know why i still need a family like this 

i really feel so.....

all those news, words, actions, everything. arg

i cant take it anymore 

i need a better way to calm down

so. 9 weeks of memorable yet torturous IPP has ended. it was a great experience and i have certainly gained pretty much during this period, be it knowing more about the financial institute to the knowing of people. i must say, working life is cruel. i hated the 2 faced person in my team. but what else can i do, i dont even have the choice to defy any orders.

and now last sem has started, with ipp report handed it. so i can finally put my heart down until the release of results. anw, it is kind of sad that i am going to graduate sooner than i know. but before that, we will be bombarded with many many project deadlines. it is time to think about my future. how i want to move on from here and where i want to go. hard decision huh. man. i hate all these.

there are different stages in life in which people will reach in time to come, just whether earlier or later. there is a stage whereby everything and anything came crushing down on you. when you felt that everything, sch, friends, family  and even non living things are out there to against you. you lead your life pessimistically and with no purpose. you think this is life and accepted it.

but after you have reached another phase in life when you get settled down. you think back and said "hey, i shld have done it another way" maybe that is the time where you have understood your life and get to know yourself a little better. this is where you found your true friends among all these butterflies. and this is where everyone's life shld be at, with the support from friends and family.

maybe i am still at the first stage huh. still takes time to forget my past. trying hard to get to know myself a little better.

trying really hard to collect my thoughts these days. but. i failed terribly. cant seem to bring my mood up no matter what i do. haiz. i feel so tired of everything. for the first time, i wonder if it would be better if i disappear from ths world. man. before i keep my heads up, just let me be pessimistic for a little more....

no matter how hard i tried to hide this feeling within me, no matter how hard i tired to forget this thing and move on, but i think i cant take it anymore. all these years of effort, just gone to waste like that. these 2 years had been hell for me, you dont know how depressing or how heartbreaking it is for me when all these happened. you dont know how much hatred i had and how hard i tried to suppress it? but i think i had enough. i am brought to this cruel world with no love, instead brought here to suffer all these. is this fair to me? i have done nothing and i got to bear the consequences. not once, but almost twice. i know it will happen soon or later, i think i should just back off right now.

this broken heart will never recover from now on.

so. one week of IPP has passed. and glad to say, i am actually surviving well in ubs. lol. the colleagues there are nice and an awesome bunch to be with. haha. i know it is weird to be coming out from my mouth since i was so resisting the idea of getting into ubs at the first place. but, i think i have put down that thinking and learn to accept it. oh wells. but needless to say, the job was tough. or rather, tiring man. waking up at 730 everyday, reaching my workplace at 910 and then ending work at 7. it is just taxing to me, physically and mentally.  ):

anw. i do learn new stuffs that is related to my course of study, which i am grateful for. but i began to doubt whether i really like this course now. i mean i am not those 9 to 5 kind of person, neither am i a talent in finance. i just dont have that kind of interest in this field. oh wells. but what can i do if i dont continue. i mean i dont know what i actually want too. oh wells.

anw. steph has gone to cambodia again! i miss there so so much ): i would have gone back if it was not because of IPP. oh wells. i love everything there!

so. majors has came and gone by. and i think i am screwed. like seriously. haiz. the amount of effort and those sleepless nights are damn freaking wasted. it totally didnt pay off man. :/ but on a happier note. i can finally take a break before next sem. but talking about break, i dont exactly have a break. internship coming up on monday. damn. how sad can my life be. so i have decided to make full use of my time for these 2 days!

fri afternoon was spent meeting up with yoo!!! (: it has been a long time man. great to see her again. went home for a quick nap and brush up before going for midnight prawning with the usual few! i must say i am really bad at prawning :/ damn. only managed to get 3/4 prawns for 3 hours!! =.= but luckily we do have some pros to get the job done. so we managed to get 23 prawns in the end with 3 rods!!! hahaha. i know its kind of pathetic but it was the process that matters huh! hahahah!!


the biggest and the smallest. haha

anw. i am only left with one more day to enjoy!!! got quite abit of stuffs to settle man. going to dye my hair, get heels and bag and... errrr i forgot the last one. but i need my sleep too. oh man. i am getting nervous. pray hard for me man. :/


i think you have cross the limit

my patience is limited so dont EVER take advantage of it. friends are who they are and not what they are. if you cant treasure your friends, then forget it. i seriously had enough of your nonsenses. damn. i think afterall, i am just a tool. forget it. no use talking about it anymore. i have seen your true colour. bastard.

trust yourself and not depend on others

had been going to sch to study for the past week or so. cant say productive but i think it is better than me staying at home. haiz. but. i think i am mentally and physically worn out for the time being. and it is kind of... cant really describe the feeling but just depressed or rather demoralised. haiz.

i think i lost the trust

so. One week just flew past like that. It was kind of fulfilling and yet depressing huh. Many outings over the first week and it was fun! Especially the movie marathons with bud, chalet with the class, and dinner with team sousday! The days were well spent. 

But sure enough, happy times are short lived, its time to settle down to get myself preparing for the majors in two weeks time. Oh man. I dont like it man :( 

Anw. I think i really shld start planning and managing my time well and not let history repeat itself. That was really hell man. So, i shld really get started now! I do hope i can keep to my promise this time eh! 

Before i stop, i would want to share this saying that i find it extremely true - it takes two years to build up a friendship, but takes only two days to break it. The only way to test it is to remain silent. Try it. It is accurate!

YES FINALLY!!!! :D its the 3 weeks break! (: a long awaited and well deserved break. it was celebration since yest! lunched at sumo house with ht and then went to her place after that. then dinnered at chomp chomp with the class! while the usual few came to my place to chill out! i shall totally enjoy myself before studying for majors!

there is this thing that had been bothering me for a long time. it was hard making up my mind but i think i have come to a conclusion. that is, you are not worth of my time and effort anymore, i had enough. it is time for me to make a change, to make my life better for the remaining days. humans are indeed selfish huh. thats life, got to accept it.

life hadnt been good these days. feeling a lil emo or rather worried. i dont know how to describe that feeling man. seriously it sucks. haiz ): 

i think you are such an asshole

just one more presentation, but there is so much to prepare.

arg. i cant take it anymore.

feeling damn shag ):



maybe breaking down is a getaway

the hectic semester is finally coming to an end. many many late and sleepless nights. results are... ok but not really to my expectation. oh wells. projects are worst, for the first time, i dreaded project meetings, i dreaded doing all those researches, i dreaded everything about projects. i know i hadnt been doing well in my grp, but i will try harder next sem. and i am sorry to all my grp members ): one more week, just 7 more days, and i will be done with all my project presentations. really really looking forward to it.

many things have changed ever since the start of sem. from combining classes to the entire study sem. i feel somehow out of place, or rather dreading sch more and more. going to sch is like a chore to me now, and not something that i would be looking forward to. 

3 years ago, when i made that decision to leave that prestigious sch that would guarantee me a degree, to a sch now that would give me a diploma and an unguaranteed future. sometimes, i do regret my decision. but 3 years on, i have since realised that i have made the best decision ever. it is not studies that made up everything, everything else do matters. but have i cherished it?

it is hard to find gold among all those waste, needless to say, i did found some throughout the 3 years. but sometimes, gold can turn stale if is it not kept properly. but it is also the owner's fault for not taking good care of it. as a owner, i do have to make decisions to throw some away and to keep the rest. but the irony is, just when i was about to keep the good ones, they started to turn stale, just when i was about to use my heart, they broke my heart into pieces, just when i was about to lower down my guards, they broke my trust. 

i need a break, to sort through my thoughts before stepping into this cruel world with no trust. i just cant lower my guards down yet. i need to look at things at a new perspective now.

one more month. just one more!!!! and i will be freed from all the projects and exams. arg!!!! there is so much to do but i dont know where to start!!!!!

21 july - gso ica2
22 july - hrm project presentation, faa project submission
23 july - cmfi project submission
26 july - faa project presentation, ib project presentation
30 july - cmfi project presentation, invst project submission

ARG!!!! SAVE MEEEE! )))): within 5 days!!! and i have got 8 icas!!!! ARGGG!

anw. its confirmed. i am the only one from nyp gg to ubs. woot. i give up on commenting man

sometimes, its better to act blur and know nothing abt anything

haha. this pic is cute! (: anw. i am feeling how the girl is feeling right now. project deadlines are drawing closer and i somehow feels insecure for all the modules. i am doomed. oh man. need to buck up.

time flies huh.one more month to majors and after which it will be my ipp. and then it will be my last sem in nyp ): i dont want to graduate! and i think being in poly is one of the best decision that i have made on my own. though i know getting a diploma is not going to get me anywhere. but; i am really glad that i came to poly. (: 

anw. talking about ipp. yes. i got into ubs ): man. i cant believe i got in. and am kind of sad and depressed about it. dont really know how to explain that kind of feeling. but. i was shocked when i heard the news. now everyone is comforting me by saying that the pay might be high, or even higher than citi, but who knows what will happen next. oh wells. wish me luck

done my napfa too. ): same thing happened. that kind of disappointment. haiz. got a bronze just cos of my 2.4km. all thanks to my knee man. was having sharp pain after my 3rd round. was thinking of whether i should retake my napfa. and i think i need to go look for a knee and ankle specialist for my condition.

so. thats all for now. parents are coming back tonight or rather early tmr morning. plus. many many things are coming up

so sch has started, and it was tiring. it seems like there is nothing to do and yet everything is piling up. man. i got to practice some time management luh. thats my new yr resolution for the past 3 yrs or so. hahahah. anw. the 2nd week of hol wasnt as great as the first but it was as busy though

21/6 monday
had IB proj meeting at 11. all we did was to split the work/ so the entire meeting ends within 2 hours.

22/6 tuesday
had HRM meeting at 12. same thing happened. booo! lunched at 1 and then we went down to sheng siong to take a look for our part b of the project. ended around 3plus, 4. went home to rest a little before heading out to meet bud! ate at aijsen and caught a movie! karate kids! not a bad show. and hs was tearing after the movie! LOL. BUT.. the best thing happened during the movie. damn. so. the theatre was actually filled. so our seats were actually 2nd row from the front. hard to watch huh. got to tilt my head in a weird position to make it comfortable. ok nvm. thats not the point. HALFWAY THROUGH THE MOVIE, there is this little girl around 4, WEARING RED, STANDING beside my seat, STARING AT ME!!!! O.O bloody hell, obviously i was freaked out. damn it. asked hs whether she saw. and luckily she did. she told me the little girl has done that a few times alr and previously she was staring at the person behind me. gosh. i was kind of scared yknow. AND THE BEST THING IS, I CANT FIND HER AFTER THE MOVIE. oh man. dont know i have seen man. :x

23/6 wednesday
it was interview at ubs for my ipp in sept the interview was around 45 min. oh man. i got asked questions that stunned me. like whats the role of a fund manager and what funds are traded in an equity fund. =.= haiz.. i was kind of nervous and stumbled :/ and loads of scenario questions. hope that i did well though. but a little portion of my mind told me that i dont want to get in. but. who knows. i dont even have the decision power man. anw. dinnered at orchard after that with parents.

24/6 thursday
lunched with ht and jon at yoshi and caught toy story 3 3D with FE! awesome show! the storyline is new and the characters are cute luh! love the show (:

25/6 friday
went malaysia with parents! my dad lost his way there. =.= we drove nearly 100km before we reached the place we wanted to go which is like only 10km from the custom. and my mum was so hungry that she said she wanted to faint. hahaha. funny parents i have huh. to shopped around at metrojaya and city square! bought a few things and dinnered before my dad lost his way again. oh man.

26/6 saturday
supposed to meet bud to celebrate her bday in advance! but i was tied down by projects. haiz. it was kind of my fault for not finding enough info on the projects. haiz. sorry bud! :/

30/6 wednesday
out with bud to celebrate her bday! went to resort world sentosa! the place is really different! haha. seemed like we are in another world there! dinnered at chilis! the food and atmosphere were good! but the only bad thing was i was having a terrible gastric pain. and i drank still. boo. anw. explored the place after dinner. the hersey's choco factory and the gift shops! AND the casino! hohoho!!! one day i want to go into the universal studio! great night out! (:

ok. so the activities more or less sumed up my hol. and i have got no more hol until i graduate ): oh man. but more outings are coming!!! lunch later with sousday and monday evening with them too!!!! really looking forward man!

anw. i got to blurt it out. i dk why. i am feeling the coldness of the world again. friends. what are friends actually. does it only implies to those who share deep to you or just those hi and bye friends. i am really getting confused by the term. i think i shld think more from now on.

ok. its 2am. was thinking whether i shld take a nap. got to fetch my parents to the airport at 345. they are going to guangzhou for 10 days!!!! (: hahah! ermmm. and i have got lessons at 9 later. woots.

there goes my hol. haiz. one more day and i am back to the hectic life of a student.
i cant believe i am stuck with 5/6 projects on hand and I CANCELLED MY OUTING JUST FOR THIS. better make it productive today or else i swear i am going to explode..#(*$@)(@*$&#(*$&(#*@$@!()$*

i damn angry with myself man. in fact felt disappointed instead. the amount of workload is like 2 mountains high. i think i let my grp mates down and i felt damn bad ); haiz

fuck you IB, FUCK YOU

so. its hol! but left with only one more week :/ but the entire week was spent meaningfully. (: lets start from fri then

11/6 friday
LAST PAPER of the term! cmfi. it is really cmi. totally got different ans from the others. ok. shant talk about it alr. so after sch, went to catch a movie with classmates. A-team. it was good. and i realised all the shows nowadays are more of a comedy than action. maybe the producers know that life is too hard now. laughter is need and it is the best medicine. lol. ok i am crapping. so after which, headed down to bugis for dinner!!!! ate at tian tian huo guo! the food is good! (: love the atmosphere too. though it is just at the roadside. haha. ate for around 2 hours and walked from bugis all the way to esplanade! rested and chatted there before heading home. was dead tired then



12/6 saturday
met up with hs at amk! to discuss for my bday. lol. she was like late for an hour or so. nearly died while waiting. haha. queued to get koi and then lunched at popeyes! discussed but to no avail.

13/6 sunday
stayed at home to rest and then went out at night with parents for a dinner celebration! (: at mandai! the food was ok cos they changed the management and then head to have ice cream at swensons! my parents are super cute! (; they got me a cake from prima deli! hhahahaha. so blew the candles at 12 midnight. (:

14/6 monday

16/6 wednesday - 17/6 thursday
badminton with classmates from 2-6. omg. i was so tired and aching all over! but it was fun! bathed and rushed down to ECP for NIGHT CYCLING! 3 of us took a cab down first cos we were afraid that the shop will be closed. then me val and nic took the public transport which took us more than an hour. PLUS the walking! gosh from the skiing park all the way to Macs. is like 34798594854km. we were so tired even before we started cycling. finally met up with the rest and dinnered at burger king. it was 10pm when we finally started our cycling. our mission is:cycle from ECP to Changi V for supper and back to ECP for sunrise.

so we kept cycling the wrong way and taking numerous number of breaks cos i was having cramps alr. then the road beside the airport runway was a killer. totally cant see the end of the road. took almost 4 hours tot cycle to changi. to reached there around 3plus. and the best thing is, all the shops are closed =.= except one drink stall and one nasi lemak stall. no choice but to get those. hahaha. so rushed back again to catch the sunrise! hated the road man. damn. reached ECP at around 630? just in time for a rest. felt asleep on the bench and missed the sunrise. hahaha. oh man.

returned the bike and took bus back. wah lao!!!!the bus driver!!! i bet he needs to pee or sth! drove the bus like some F1 driver. DAMN FAST. i kept knocking my head against everything and anything. damn pain leh! =.= reached home, bathe and slept from 10 all the way 5. ps-ed the kbox team. hahaha oops.

cant help but keep thinking about sousday. i want to go back there again. being immersed into the world of purity. the smiles, the sincerity and the happiness were all geunine as compared to all these while. i am really too tired of this. i need a break.

nothing is impossible, team sousday!

so! fri to sun was sbm ltc-ogl camp. the camp was alright i guess just abit of hinges here and there. but overall, it was fine. first time being facil! a different experience! (: i am in charge of group 6 with derek! hahah! cougar!

fri
woke up at an unearthly time of 645am to report to sch by 730 for some facil briefing. and guess what. i was one of the earliest there! =.= so in the end the briefing never took place with the campers arriving ever earlier than the facils. to sum up, first day was the usual get to know your group members day with all the ice breaking games. really got to admit, it was rather boring :/ went home after that cos got to fetch my parents from causeway at night. get to slp at home though!

sat
worst still. need to wake up like 530?!!?!?!? cos need to gather at 630 in sch for facils. was late, so cabbed to sch in the end. it was sembawang park day. spent the entire day there being game master in the morning and runner in the afternoon. accompanied corn to run ard the park to make sure everything runs smoothly. dinner was ok. cos me and derek were just looking at our group cook and they didnt have enough to eat at all i guess. night was the ah gua show and then went to prepare the logs with corn for the black market game.

sun
ordered macs for supper at 1am. since we need to wake the campers up at 230, we didnt even bother to slp at all :/ sirens sounded at 230. with campers still in daze. lol. i really pity them luh. after some pumping, made them return back to slp and then sounded the siren yet again at 3. this time is for real. no more sleeping for the campers and the pumpings start. but i find that as compared to last year, they really had a easier life this year. didnt really make them pump much and then it was pt for them. managed to get a nap before the black market game starts. was so tried that i fell asleep at the stadium with the campers playing. lol.


COUGAR!  (:

it was a busy day!

went to sch at 12 to hand in the receipts (yet again) to the student affair. hope this time, it wont get rejected again. then lunched with ting and then met jing to look at her eat. lol. then it was down to amk for a HIGHLIGHT!!! i shall say, the aunt there is really... talkative? i dont know! but she did have many comments about the highlighting and stuff. so highlighted my hair copper red? haha. i dont really know the colour well too. but glad that it turned out good yknow!!! was totally shocked to see the end result from the previous person. gosh. gave me a heart attack luh! and the method she used to highlight my hair is.... UNIQUE! hahahahha.

then home for a quick wash up before heading out again to meet sousday team!!!! :D:D met them at 615 at orchard mrt! turn up rate - 10 out of 17? with Dr Chua! not that bad luh! cos it was fun! (: watched alice in the wonderland 3D with them. the show is horrible. seriously. DONT EVER WATCH IT. it is like the worst show ever. :/ damn. then chilled at coffee bean somewhere along orchard before heading home cos some have attachment the next day!!!! great day out! (:

BUT, i want to say a BIG Thank You to everyone of you who made this trip possible and a memorable one for me!!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!! i love you guys and meet up soon! (:

countdown to cambodia trip - 4 days!

i am getting excited and anxious at the same time! it will be such a good learning experience to look around outside the country! but come to think that i will be having my time of the month there really turns me off. =.= haha

so. had been really busy ever since after exams. going out almost every single day, either for job interview, meetings, meet ups or work. really really tired these few days. i shall update some of the days:

wed 17/2
out to ikea with parents to look at the furnitures and i am glad to say that... I AM GG TO CHANGE MY DESK REAL SOON!!!! :D:D like finally after nearly 10 years of usage! this time will be a bigger one with more space for my laptop and other stuffs! then down to cousin's for some gambling and dinner.

fri 19/2
out with yanxiu after 2 years of not meeting up! :D glad to catch up with her and finally got lobangs from her. haha

mon & tue 22,23/2
out for job interviews.

wed 24/2
went to sch to submit the vaccine receipts for reimbursement. DAMN MAFAN I TELL YOU. need to copy everything and then collect the signatures plus everything else. =.= and guess what. we cant get reimburse in the end. so need to refill in the form again = need to go back to sch again.
then out with yoo in the afternoon! ate at suki! awesome food! chat for real long. from 1-5 and we were all along eating. hahah!! that meal really last me for my dinner! hahahaha

thurs 25/2
went for another job interview and i got a flyer distribution job. lol. shall further elaborate later on

fri 26/2
went to sch again for the receipts! AND THEN.... mishap happened. haiz. shant explain too much. anw. dinnered with classmates at pizza hut at doby. all of them came from work and they looked real tired. actually had fun listening to them complaining about work. haha. then the usual few came to my place for a drink. and we got kicked out by the security =.= so left the place to look for somewhere at the void deck. and we started telling ghost stories which is like kind of freaky. and i can still feel the chill until today. went for early breakfast at 4 and stayed there until 6.

sat 27/2
went to sch yet again to do the packing for the trip. quite fun and we were playing with the crocodile thing. yknow the teeth thing, which you have to push the teeth down and see which tooth causes it to shut?? haha yeah that one!!! actually this is a donation from the nyp staff, and we were so engrossed in playing it that we decided not to give it out to the kids in cambodia. and we decided...... TO BRING THERE AND PLAY OURSELVES!!!! :D:D:D haha. so packing lasted for 3-4 hours and we are 140kg overweight. it is like 1000++ fine =.= so our own luggage weight have been reduced from the already pathetic 10kg to 8kg.  reached home at ard 4 to took a quick nap.

sun 28/2
work!!!! flyer distribution at J8. eh from 12-8. met a few friends there and nobody wants to take the flyer leh!!!! stood there for 3 hours and was only able to give out less than 200 maybe? so guess what! the job got so boring that I WENT HOME AT 345! LOL. slacked at home and then went back there at 730 to tell them that i finished distributing the flyers! hahahahahha!!! oops. :/ i think i shld stop working as a flyer distributor. haha

so tmr i will be gg to sch for meeting in the morning! and we will be learning some dance for the kids there. gosh. and last minute shopping for the trip. will be staying at home to rest on tue and wed before leaving!! and we decided to leave for airport on wed night, taking the last train there and camp overnight there! :D:D

so! my last update before i come back!

BYEBYE!
